meanings.definition: relating to or capable of killing sperm
meanings.sent1: The spermicidal spray was effective in preventing pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: She used a spermicidal gel as an additional form of contraception.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's spermicidal powers saved the day in a unique way.
meanings.sent4: The cleaning solution was so strong, it had a spermicidal effect on the bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The bright red warning label indicated the spermicidal nature of the product.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended a spermicidal foam for birth control.
meanings.sent2: They purchased a spermicidal lubricant for added protection.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the awkwardness of buying spermicidal products.
meanings.sent4: The spermicidal agent worked swiftly to neutralize any sperm present.
meanings.sent5: The clinic provided free samples of spermicidal condoms for safe sex practices.

meanings.definition: causing the death of sperm cells
meanings.sent1: The spermicidal effect of the medication was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The new detergent claimed to have spermicidal properties.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful behavior had a spermicidal impact on the mouse population.
meanings.sent4: The intense heat had a spermicidal influence on the reproductive process.
meanings.sent5: The scientist discovered a natural plant with spermicidal qualities.
